item.title: Netflix’s Italian Takeover: Streamer Brings 3 Starry Titles and Top Executives to Venice Film Festival
item.description: Expected on the Lido this year are Ted Sarandos, Bela Bajaria, Dan Lin and awards guru Lisa Taback to support films from Guillermo del Toro, Noah Baumbach and Kathryn Bigelow.

item.title: How Netflix Took Big Swings to Spread the Word About ‘Happy Gilmore 2’
item.description: Adam Sandler returns as the golfer with anger issues in director Kyle Newacheck’s sequel that is now streaming.

item.title: Netflix Content Chief Bela Bajaria on Emmys’ ‘Squid Game’ Snub: ‘It’s Surprising It Wouldn’t Be Recognized’

item.title: Bela Bajaria on Which Emmy Nominee She Texted First and One Giant “Disappointment” of a Snub
item.description: Netflix’s chief content officer talks to The Hollywood Reporter about posthumous ‘The Residence’ nominations, and what gift you send the youngest-ever nominee for supporting actor in a limited series.
